game.name: Bakumatsu Rouman Tokubetsu Hen - Gekka no Kenshi - Tsuki ni Saku Hana, Chiri Yuku Hana

game.desc: A port of the successful 2D fighter Last Blade for the NeoGeo Pocket Color. The port features nearly all the characters featured in the original game clashing against each other using a limited color palette and a new super-deformed character design, but otherwise identically as in their arcade counterpart. You select your character from a selection of swordsmen and then procee...
game.image: /mnt/store/Emulation/Assets/RomScan/SNK_Neo_Geo_Pocket_Color/Box/Bakumatsu Rouman Tokubetsu Hen - Gekka no Kenshi - Tsuki ni Saku Hana, Chiri Yuku Hana.jpg

game.name: Baseball Stars Color
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Baseball Stars Color (World) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: One of the best handheld baseball games at it's time, and also one of the very few sports games for the Neo Geo Pocket Color

game.name: Big Bang Pro Wrestling
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Big Bang Pro Wrestling (Japan) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: Only a handful of top wrestlers can be show their face on the TV for their fans at home. In the I.E.W mat, this rule is no exception. In an event practiced for 300 years, only the best performances are in demand. This year, the great king of the I.E.W, Joseph Steel, returns to defend his throne. The story of eight top wrestlers competing for the greatest prize on the ring, the ...

game.name: Bikkuriman 2000 - Viva! Pocket Festiva!
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Bikkuriman 2000 - Viva! Pocket Festiva! (Japan).ngc
game.desc: A tie-in game for the Bikkuriman 2000 anime in Japan. The game's Neo Geo Pocket Color version could link to Dreamcast version.

game.name: Biomotor Unitron
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Biomotor Unitron (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Biomotor Unitron is a RPG for the Neo Geo Pocket Color. After a meteor brings a new source of energy to the world, the construction of giant robots begins. These robots are used for entertainment and fight in arena fights against one-another for the title Master of Masters. You play a duo of characters that participates in these gladiator battles....

game.name: Bust-A-Move Pocket
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Bust-A-Move Pocket (USA).ngc
game.desc: Bust-A-Move Pocket, also called Puzzle Bobble Mini, is a Neo Geo Pocket Color version of the Bust-A-Move (Puzzle Bobble) series of puzzle games. It was released on the Neo Geo Pocket Color by Taito in 1999. The format is similar to Bust-A-Move 2 for the PlayStation. The game's Puzzle mode includes a feature that saves initials of those who have completed the level in the fastest time....

game.name: Cool Boarders Pocket
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Cool Boarders Pocket (Japan, Europe) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: This is a game in the Cool Boarders franchise for the NeoGeo Pocket Color. It was released in 2000, near the end of the console's life time.

game.name: Cool Cool Jam
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Cool Cool Jam (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Cool Cool Jam is comparable in gameplay to other rhythm games such as: PaRappa the Rapper, Donkey Konga or Beatmania. The storyline involves a boy and a girl who are transported 1,000 years into the future. To return home they must form a successful and popular music band. The game can be played by one or two players. In two player mode the game plays like a duet; the players t...

game.name: Crush Roller
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Crush Roller (World) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: More color! More power! The exciting chase of a lifetime is on! Finish painting roads before the monsters stop you! Grab those amusing, pesky irksters.

game.name: Dark Arms - Beast Buster 1999
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Dark Arms - Beast Buster 1999 (World) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: Dark Arms: Beast Buster 1999 is a RPG for the Neo Geo Pocket Color. It's a spin-off from the arcade game Beast Busters. Parallel to our world we find the Dark Realm. As the player, you find access to this parallel dimension after signing a pact with the Master of the Dark Realm. In his realm, you are supposed to catch monsters. These can be fed to your biological weapons: Dark Arms....

game.name: Delta Warp
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Delta Warp (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Delta Warp is a Miscellaneous game, published by Iosys, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.name: Densetsu no Ogre Battle Gaiden - Zenobia no Ouji
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Densetsu no Ogre Battle Gaiden - Zenobia no Ouji (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Legend of Ogre Battle Gaiden: Prince of Zenobia (伝説のオウガバトル外伝 ゼノビアの皇子 Densetsu no Ōga Batoru Gaiden: Zenobia no Ōji?, Legend of Ogre Battle Tale: The Prince of Zenobia) is a strategy video game developed by Quest for the Neo Geo Pocket Color, and is currently the only Ogre Battle title to not be released in English due to the system being discontinued in areas outside Japan....
game.image: /mnt/store/Emulation/Assets/RomScan/SNK_Neo_Geo_Pocket_Color/Box/Densetsu no Ogre Battle Gaiden - Zenobia no Ouji.jpg

game.name: Dive Alert - Becky's Version
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Dive Alert - Becky's Version (USA, Europe).ngc
game.desc: Dive Alert: Becky's Version is an RPG for the Neo Geo Pocket Color. There is another version of Dive Alert called Dive Alert: Matt's Version. The two games are rather like joint Pokemon releases (Red/Blue, etc) wherein they are overall the same game with a variety of smaller differences. The player takes control of a character named Becky....

game.name: Dive Alert - Matt's Version
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Dive Alert - Matt's Version (USA, Europe).ngc
game.desc: One of two Dive Alert games, this one is a role-playing game for the Neo Geo Pocket Color starring Matt.

game.name: Dokodemo Mahjong
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Dokodemo Mahjong (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Doko Demo Mahjong is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by ADK, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.name: Dynamite Slugger
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Dynamite Slugger (Japan, Europe) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: A baseball game for the Neo Geo Pocket Color, similar to games such as Baseball Stars.

game.name: Evolution - Eternal Dungeons
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Evolution - Eternal Dungeons (Europe).ngc
game.desc: A portable version of Evolution: The World of Sacred Device. Eternal Dungeon tells the story of the young explorer Mag Launcher and his quest for the fabled Evolutia, an item of immense power. The basic premise of the game is to take quests in the town and then assemble your party and attempt to clear out the many dungeons in the game, grinding your characters and getting the l...

game.name: Fantastic Night Dreams Cotton
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Fantastic Night Dreams Cotton (Europe).ngc
game.desc: Fantastic Night Dreams: Cotton is a 2D side-scrolling shooter in which the player takes the role of the young witch Cotton, who sets out on her magical broom on a quest to get her favorite candy. Fortunately for us her obsession gets her in the way of several world-threatening terrors that she must destroy in standard shooter fare....

game.name: Faselei!
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Faselei! (Europe).ngc
game.desc: Faselei! is one of the last titles to be released for the Neo Geo Pocket Color and even features digitised lyrics to the game's main theme. Heavily story driven, this strategy RPG takes place in a time when mechs known as TS are the weapon of choice for combat. Gameplay revolves around the battles and customising your TS between those battles....

game.name: Ganbare Neo Poke-kun
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Ganbare Neo Poke-kun (Ka) (Japan).ngc
game.desc: In this game you keep watch on the wacky Neo Poke-kun, a cartoony programmer thing that lives locked in his small Tokyo apartment. You don't have direct control of his actions but instead interact with him indirectly by switching stuff in his apartment on and off, which triggers different reactions from him. More importantly you can invite different characters to visit Neo Poke...

game.name: Infinity Cure
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Infinity Cure (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Infinity Cure is an Action game, published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.name: King of Fighters R-2 - Pocket Fighting Series
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/King of Fighters R-2 - Pocket Fighting Series (World) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: Mix it up in COLOR with King Of Fighters R-2 now on NEOGEO Pocket Color! Get SKILLS in the MAKING Mode and create your very own custom-made character! You can also play two-player VS. MODE battles and trade SKILLS using the NEOGEO Pocket Link Cable! 14 characters to choose from including 2 new characters make King Of Fighters R-2 H-O-T!
game.image: /mnt/store/Emulation/Assets/RomScan/SNK_Neo_Geo_Pocket_Color/Box/King of Fighters R-2 - Pocket Fighting Series.jpg

game.name: Koi Koi Mahjong
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Koi Koi Mahjong (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Koi Koi Mahjong is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Visco, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.name: Magical Drop Pocket
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Magical Drop Pocket (Japan).ngc
game.desc: A Magical Drop game for the Neo Geo Pocket. It features characters from Magical Drop 3, but with different patterns and new storylines.

game.name: Memories Off - Pure
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Memories Off - Pure (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Memories Off: Pure is a prequel to Memories Off. The events of the game take place three years before those of the previous game, when the protagonist Tomoya Mikami was still attending middle school. The game primarily revolves around his relationships with his childhood friend Yue Imasaka and Ayaka Hizuki, whose tragic fate is mentioned in the first game....

game.name: Metal Slug - 1st Mission
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Metal Slug - 1st Mission (World) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: As a member of the elite forces squad "Peregrine Falcons," your mission is to eliminate the evil Colonel Bildegaarn. Using the Metal Slug multifunction tank and the Slug Flyer as well as your wits and handgun blast through up to 17 missions in your quest to make the world safe from tyranny. Multiple stage progressions and a gameplay ranking system give reason to play through more than once....

game.name: Metal Slug - 2nd Mission
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Metal Slug - 2nd Mission (World) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: Take control of the Metal Slug tank on the NGPC once again, this time to defeat the rebel strike force "Phantom." Travel through 38 stages in a non-linear battle path defeating enemy troops and rescuing hostages. Pilot the Metal Slug tank, Slug Flyer combat jet, and the Slug Sub submarine and fire the heavy machine gun, rocket launcher, and fire gun....

game.name: Mezase! Kanji Ou
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Mezase! Kanji Ou (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Mesaze! Kanji-Ou is a Miscellaneous game, published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.name: Neo Baccarat - Real Casino Series
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Neo Baccarat - Real Casino Series (World).ngc
game.desc: Neo Baccarat is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Dyna Corporation and published by SNK, which was released in Europe in 2000.

game.name: Neo Derby Champ Daiyosou
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Neo Derby Champ Daiyosou (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Neo Derby Champ Daiyosou is a Sports game, developed and published by Dyna Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.name: Neo Geo Cup '98 Plus
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Neo Geo Cup '98 Plus (World) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: NeoGeo Cup '98 Plus is a soccer game for the Neo Geo Pocket. The game features single match play, head-to-head play (using a link cable), and story mode. You can choose to play one of 16 international teams. Each team has their own collective stats. On the field you can perform passes, shots, dribbles, slidings and charges. In the story mode you have to win as many matches as possible in a series of tournaments....

game.name: Neo Poke Pro Yakyuu
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Neo Poke Pro Yakyuu (Japan).ngc
game.desc: NeoPoke Pro Yakyuu is a Sports game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.name: Neo Turf Masters
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Neo Turf Masters (World) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: The player picks one of six available golfers and competes on a number of golf courses around the world, including Japan (Fujiyama Oriental Golf Club), America (Grand Canyon Golf Course), Australia (Blue Lagoon Golf Course), and Germany (Baden Golf Course). The game features two modes of play. The first is Stroke Play, in which the player attempts to get the best score by playing all 18 holes....

game.name: Nigeronpa
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Nigeronpa (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Nige-Ron-Pa is an RPG for the Neo Geo Pocket Color, published and developed by Dennou Club.

game.name: Oekaki Puzzle
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Oekaki Puzzle (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Picture Puzzle is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Success, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.name: Pac-Man
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Pac-Man (World) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: One of the most popular and influential games of the 1980's, Pac-Man stars a little, yellow dot-muncher who works his way around to clear a maze of the various dots and fruit which inhabit the board. Pac-Man's goal is continually challenged by four ghosts: The shy blue ghost Bashful (Inky), the trailing red ghost Shadow (Blinky), the fast pink ghost Speedy (Pinky), and the forgetful orange ghost Pokey (Clyde)....

game.name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket - Azteca
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket - Azteca (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Azteca is a Miscellaneous game, published by Aruze Corp, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.desc: Pachisuro Aruze Oogoku Pocket: Dekahel 2 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Aruze Corp, which was released in Japan in 2001.

game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket - Delsol 2 (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Del Sol 2 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Aruze Corp, which was released in Japan in 2000.

game.name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket - Hanabi
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket - Hanabi (Japan) (v1.02).ngc
game.desc: This game covers the Growing popularity in Japan of Gambling. The game is a slots machine game but it has many modes. A game cant just be a slot machinne game to be fun so there a many a hidden delight for you to find.

game.desc: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Porcano 2 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Aruze Corp, which was released in Japan in 2000

game.desc: Pachinko Hisshou Guide: Pocket Parlor is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Vistec, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.name: Party Mail
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Party Mail (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Party Mail is a Miscellaneous game, developed by ADK and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.name: Picture Puzzle
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Picture Puzzle (USA, Europe).ngc
game.desc: A puzzle game where players must put pictures together to make an image. It costs 80 MSP.

game.name: Pocket Love if
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Pocket Love if (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Pocket Love: If is an Adventure game, developed and published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 1999.

game.name: Pocket Reversi
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Pocket Reversi (Europe).ngc
game.desc: A board game for the Neo Geo Pocket Color, released in Japan and Europe in 2000.

game.name: Puyo Pop
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Puyo Pop (World) (En,Ja) (v1.05).ngc
game.desc: The follow-up to Puyo Puyo is, like its predecessor, a falling block game in which the goal is to combine four or more blocks (Puyos) of the same color, which then disappear. The remaining Puyos will then fall down and can produce combos which can cause special blocks (Nuisance Puyos, that can only be destroyed by eliminating adjacent Puyos) to appear on the enemy's field....

game.name: Puzzle Bobble Mini
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Puzzle Bobble Mini (Japan, Europe) (v1.09).ngc
game.desc: Bust-A-Move Pocket, also called Puzzle Bobble Mini, is a Neo Geo Pocket Color version of the Bust-A-Move (Puzzle Bobble) series of puzzle games. It was released on the Neo Geo Pocket Color by Taito in 1999. The format is similar to Bust-A-Move 2 for the PlayStation. The game's Puzzle mode includes a feature that saves initials of those who have completed the level in the fastest time....

game.name: Puzzle Link
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Puzzle Link (Europe).ngc
game.desc: Puzzle Link is a game where blocks of matching color have to be dissolved. New blocks constantly scroll into the screen from the top. The game is over when the first blocks reach the bottom of the screen. You can dissolve blocks by shooting at them. The shots form a line where they impact. If that line connects otherwise unconnected blocks of the same color they will dissolve....

game.name: Puzzle Link 2
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Puzzle Link 2 (USA, Europe).ngc
game.desc: The gameplay of Puzzle Link 2 is generally identical to the first game: Puzzle Link is a game where blocks of matching color have to be dissolved. New blocks constantly scroll into the screen from the top. The game is over when the first blocks reach the bottom of the screen. You can dissolve blocks by shooting at them. The shots form a line where they impact....

game.name: Rockman - Battle & Fighters
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Rockman - Battle & Fighters (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Rockman: Battle & Fighters is a portable, stripped-down compilation of two arcade fighting games: Mega Man: The Power Battle Mega Man 2: The Power Fighters The game has robots-heroes from the Mega Man (Rockman) series: Mega Man, Proto Man, Bass (the second game has a fourth character, Duo). The player controls one of them and must fight against another robots (bosses from the Mega Man series).

game.name: Samurai Shodown! 2 - Pocket Fighting Series
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Samurai Shodown! 2 - Pocket Fighting Series (World) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: In Samurai Shodown II players take on one of the roles of fifteen warriors, fighting their way through the land to defeat Rashojin Mizuki, who was thrown into the sea when she was a little girl and since then became a servant of the dark god Ambrosia. This sequel to Samurai Shodown introduces five new playable characters: the warrior and Haohmaru's rival Genjuro Kibagami, the c...

game.name: Shanghai Mini
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Shanghai Mini (World) (En,Ja) (Proto 1).ngc
game.desc: Shanghai Mini is a release in the series of Activision's tile matching games. Included are classic, tournament and dynasty modes. Classic is normal game with six different board layouts. In tournament game player challenges the Tower of Shanghai and tries to beat the Shanghai Master by solving different board layouts within time limit....

game.name: Shougi no Tatsujin Color
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Shougi no Tatsujin Color (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Syougi no Tatsujin is a Japanese style chess game. In single player mode the player must compete against computerized opponents (represented by a digitized photograph) to win the tournament. In two player mode, each player competes against each another.

game.name: SNK Gals' Fighters
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/SNK Gals' Fighters (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Sugar and spice and everything nice, that's what little girls are made of... NOT! It's time for the ladies to show who's boss in this superb all-girls fighting fantasy! Eight fabulous femme fatales to choose from and five different game modes! Use Super Attacks and collect and trade special items!

game.name: SNK vs. Capcom - Card Fighters 2 - Expand Edition
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/SNK vs. Capcom - Card Fighters 2 - Expand Edition (Japan).ngc
game.desc: SNK vs. Capcom: Card Fighter's Clash 2 Expand Edition continues the mascot packed trading card game action that began with the original.

game.name: SNK vs. Capcom - Card Fighters' Clash - Capcom Version
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/SNK vs. Capcom - Card Fighters' Clash - Capcom Version (USA, Europe).ngc

game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/SNK vs. Capcom - The Match of the Millennium (World) (En,Ja).ngc
game.desc: With 18 starting characters (26 total after unlocking), numerous battle modes and varied minigames, this may be the largest fighting game for the Neo Geo Pocket Color. Choose the fighting style that suits you from the available Single, Tag and Team modes. The SC Olympic mode grants access to minigames from a music game featuring Felicia to a whack-a-mole style game with Jubei....

game.name: Sonic The Hedgehog - Pocket Adventure
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Sonic The Hedgehog - Pocket Adventure (World).ngc
game.desc: Help Sonic rescue his forest friends from the evil Dr. Robotnik. Grab those golden rings and collect all the chaos emeralds for special bonuses. Rush through multiple bonus levels and challenge the high score record. Collect puzzle pieces and complete the mystery photo. Play against a friend in a 2-player Vs. battle. The action is gonna be super SONIC!

game.name: Soreike!! Hanafuda Doujou
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Soreike!! Hanafuda Doujou (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Sore Ike!! Hanafuda Doujou is a Miscellaneous game, published by Daina, which was released in Japan in 1999

game.name: Super Real Mahjong - Premium Collection
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Super Real Mahjong - Premium Collection (Japan).ngc
game.desc: Super Real Mahjong Premium Collection is the first handheld installment in the Super Real Mahjong series. As usual, you play strip mahjong with pretty girls, this time several from many of the games. However, due to the system's limitations, only a few strip scenes are animated. It also has some visual novel-like qualities, particularly a story mode where you try to focus on one girl each time it is played....

game.name: The King of Fighters - Battle de Paradise
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/King of Fighters, The - Battle de Paradise (Japan).ngc
game.desc: The King of Fighters: Battle de Paradise is a minigame collection, similar to Mario Party or Sonic Shuffle, based loosely on The King of Fighters '99.
game.image: /mnt/store/Emulation/Assets/RomScan/SNK_Neo_Geo_Pocket_Color/Box/The King of Fighters - Battle de Paradise.jpg

game.name: The Last Blade - Beyond the Destiny
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/SNK - Neo Geo Pocket Color/Last Blade, The - Beyond the Destiny (Europe).ngc
game.desc: A port of the successful 2D fighter Last Blade for the NeoGeo Pocket Color. The port features nearly all the characters featured in the original game clashing against each other using a limited color palette and a new super-deformed character design, but otherwise identically as in their arcade counterpart.
